content: I don't like fishing. What I like is watching them swim around the bait. {A虎啸}I promise this time I won't swipe at them with my paw—I've got my fishing rod with me!

content: There are only a few types of fish for me: Those that taste good, those that don't, {A虎啸}and those that look toxic enough to knock you out.
